original_title: Jorge Mautner: O Filho do Holocausto
overview: The film follows the birth of Jorge Mautner up to his 17 years. He was born in Brazil shortly after his parents fled the Holocaust. Raised by a nanny who introduced him to Candomblé, Mautner became a precursor of the Tropicália, contributing to the construction of the identity of Brazilian music.
title: Jorge Mautner: Son of the Holocaust
